  • Type Parameters:
    BEANTYPE - The type of the Bean
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.vaadin.data.Container, com.vaadin.data.Container.Filterable, com.vaadin.data.Container.Indexed, com.vaadin.data.Container.ItemSetChangeNotifier, com.vaadin.data.Container.Ordered, com.vaadin.data.Container.PropertySetChangeNotifier, com.vaadin.data.Container.SimpleFilterable, com.vaadin.data.Container.Sortable, com.vaadin.data.Property.ValueChangeListener, Serializable, IShortcutBeanContainer

    public class ShortcutBeanItemContainer<BEANTYPE>
extends ShortcutBeanContainer<BEANTYPE,BEANTYPE>
implements IShortcutBeanContainer
    An extension of the BeanContainer, which adds shorcuts properties.
    Since:
    0.2.0
    Author:
    Vincent Demeester
    See Also:
    ShortcutBeanContainer, BeanItemContainer, Serialized Form
